name: The Fountain of Youth (penguin55)
description:
The Fountain of Youth is a game about changing the player age using the fountain of youth. Each age have different abilities to reach different star that be must collected on the levels to progress the game.

Control:
A : Move to Left
D : Move to Right
R : Change Youth
Q : Attack (Old Age Only)
Space : Jump


Thanks to:
Raion Community
